params.taskDescription: Gerry worked Sudoku puzzles and crossword puzzles this week. The number of Sudoku puzzles he completed is eight more than twice the number of crossword puzzles. He completed 22 Sudoku puzzles. Construct a linear equation and solve to find how many crossword puzzles he did.

params.taskDescription: Laurie has $46,000 invested in stocks. The amount invested in stocks is $8,000 less than three times the amount invested in bonds. Construct a linear equation and solve to find how much Laurie invested in bonds.

questionSetStimulus: For the following exercises, construct a linear equation to solve an application.
